API Reference¶

Sample application that opens a window.

This demonstrates that the project is set up correctly.

class src.demo.app.DemoApp(name='ZeroStart Demo')[source]¶

Bases: object

A simple demo application.

This class provides a minimal working example to demonstrate that the ZeroStart setup is functioning correctly.

run()[source]¶

Run the demo application.
